column4: speaking of virtualbox, is there a compare/contrast between that and vmware?  (usability/etc, not opensoure vs nonopensource)
I see tons of them, but nothing "definitive"
yeah, there are, but most seem to devolve into opensource vs nonopensource, without addressing performance, memory footprint, etc.
this channel is for ubuntu support  - please take discussion requests elsewhere ( #ubuntu-offtopic )
